rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows facing east and north for natural light as per Vastu. Minimalist decor with neutral colors.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed for casual dining with a simple setup and minimal furniture.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen area with modern minimalist fixtures. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by placing the cooking zone towards the north-east corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Main bedroom located in a quiet area of the ground floor with a private balcony overlooking the garden. Vastu guidelines suggest aligning the bed towards the north.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: Integrated library/study space featuring bookshelves and minimal furniture arrangement. Placed in a location that encourages concentration, ideally along an eastern wall.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A small guest room with essential furnishings; positioned adjacent to the master bedroom for ease of access and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom placed conveniently near both bedrooms. Vastu principles recommend that water elements be located in the north-east sector.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A minimalistic entrance with a vestibule leading to the living area. Designed as per Vastu guidelines with a south-west approach.

openings.name: Balcony Entrance
openings.description: Provides access from the master bedroom to an adjoining balcony that overlooks the garden for fresh air.

openings.name: Service Exit
openings.description: Secondary exit near the kitchen area for service or emergency egress.
